scripts.clean:all: find * -maxdepth 0 ! -name package.json -not -name scripts -not -name prod_work -print0 | xargs -0 rm -rf --
scripts.clean:src: npm run clean:js && npm run clean:js.map && npm run clean:json && rm -f src/main.aot.ts
scripts.cp:aot: cp aot_files/index.html aot_files/favicon.ico public/ && cp aot_files/main.aot.ts src/
scripts.make:new: npm run clean:all && npm run copy:new
scripts.make: npm run clean:all && npm run copy:new && npm run clean:users
scripts.save: [[ -d public ]] && [[ -d ./prod_work ]] && rm ./prod_work -rf;  mv public prod_work || echo 'compile first!!!'
scripts.build: npm run build:aa && npm run cp:aot && ngc -p tsconfig-prod-aot.json
scripts.prod: npm run build && npm run build:css && webpack --config webpack/aot.config.js
scripts.compile: [[ ! -d public ]] && mkdir public; npm run prod && npm run cp:htpacc && npm run clean:src
scripts.save: [[ -d public ]] && [[ -d ./prod_work/aa ]] && rm ./prod_work/aa -rf;  mv public prod_work/aa || echo 'compile first!!!'
